text: (ai rasool) unase poochho to ki tum ne jin logon ko (khuda ka) shareek banaaya hai koee bhee aisa hai jo makhalookaat ko pahalee baar paida kare phir un ko (marane ke baad) dobaara zinda kare (to kya javaab degen) tumhee kaho ki khuda hee pahale bhee paida karata hai phir vahee dobaara zinda karata hai to kidhar tum ulte ja rahe ho
